segments.text: Excuse me , do you go to the Central Park ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this is the right bus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you please tell me when I get to the Central Park ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . I'll call out the stops .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( A few minutes later . ) Should I get off at the next stop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , don't worry . I'll get you off when you get there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not that long . Two more stops , and you'll get off , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
